name: Colliscanner
tagline: Raspberry Pi barcode scanner working with Colruyt Collect & Go
body:
# ColliScanner
Raspberry Pi barcode scanner working with Colruyt Collect & Go

Usage: python main.py \<username\> \<password\>

## Dependencies:
* httplib2==0.9.2
* numpy==1.9.3
* picamera==1.10
* Pillow==3.0.0
* pygame==1.9.2a0
* wheel==0.24.0
* zbar==0.10
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
